MsgJp: 魔物は増える一方だ
MsgEn: The monsters keep increasing.

MsgJp: やあ、そっちはどうだい
MsgEn: Hey, how are you doing?

MsgJp: 白竜さまのために、だな――
MsgEn: For the sake of the White Dragon.

MsgJp: こう魔物が増えちゃ、たまらないな
MsgEn:
I can't stand it when these monsters increase
like this.

MsgJp: まぁ、体には気をつけろよ
MsgEn: Well, be careful with your body.

MsgJp: いいな、気は抜くなよ
MsgEn: That's nice, don't let your guard down.

MsgJp: お前はポーン持ちなのか？　羨ましいよ
MsgEn: Are you a pawn bearer? I'm envious.

MsgJp: ふう、なかなか気が休まらないよ
MsgEn: Phew, it's hard to relax.

MsgJp: 任務は任務だからな
MsgEn: It's a mission, after all.

MsgJp: もっと鍛えないとな――
MsgEn: I need to train more...

MsgJp: ん、調子はどうだ？
MsgEn: Hmm, how are you feeling?

MsgJp: 白竜さまの加護を！
MsgEn: Under the protection of The White Dragon!

MsgJp: 物資補給も魔物討伐も終わりがみえんよ
MsgEn:
Supplies replenishment and enemy extermination
have no end in sight.

MsgJp: ご機嫌いかがかしら？
MsgEn: How are you feeling?

MsgJp: お互い、油断せずいきましょう
MsgEn: Let's both be careful and not let our guard down.

MsgJp:
覚者も騎士も、苦労は同じだと
思うのよね
MsgEn:
Both the Arisen and the Knights face the same
hardships, I believe.

MsgJp: あぁ、調子はどうだ？
MsgEn: Yeah, how's it going?

MsgJp: 魔物どもは増える一方だな
MsgEn: The number of monsters is increasing.

MsgJp: ん、何か用か？
MsgEn: Hmm, what can I do for you?

MsgJp: ――装備の点検はこまめにな
MsgEn:
- The inspection of the equipment should be done
regularly.

MsgJp: 準備はいつも整えておけよ
MsgEn: Always be prepared.

MsgJp: 道具類はまさかの時に必要だぞ
MsgEn: Tools are necessary in case of emergencies.

MsgJp: ふう、まったくお互い大変そうね
MsgEn:
Phew, both of us seem to be going through a tough
time, don't we?

MsgJp:
魔物に食われるくらいなら
逃げるよ、わたしは
MsgEn: I'd rather run away than be eaten by demons.

MsgJp: さぁ、次はどうしようか
MsgEn: So, what should we do next?

MsgJp: 調子はどうだ？
MsgEn: How's it going?

MsgJp:
装備はできるだけ軽くしておけよ
足の差はでかいぞ
MsgEn:
Try to keep your equipment as light as possible.
The difference in mobility is significant.

MsgJp:
大型魔物に登るときは、奴らの動きを
よく観察しろよ
MsgEn:
When climbing on large monsters, observe their
movements well.

MsgJp: うん、何？
MsgEn: Yeah, what?

MsgJp: ごめんね、今ちょっと話しかけないで
MsgEn: I'm sorry, please don't talk to me right now

MsgJp: 特に用はないんでしょ？
MsgEn: You don't have any special purpose, right?

MsgJp: ――ああ、なんだ？
MsgEn: Oh, what is it?

MsgJp: どうした、何か聞きたいのか？
MsgEn: What's wrong, do you want to ask something?

MsgJp: 敵はいつくるかわからんぞ
MsgEn: You never know when the enemy will strike.

MsgJp: ご機嫌いかが？
MsgEn: How are you feeling?

MsgJp: ここには何しにきたの？
MsgEn: What did you come here for?

MsgJp: さ、そろそろ別のところへいこうかな
MsgEn: Well, it's time to go somewhere else.

MsgJp: ふむ――なにかね？
MsgEn: Hmm, what is it?

MsgJp: 近頃はなかなか厄介な事件が増えてきたな
MsgEn:
Lately, there have been quite a few troublesome
incidents.

MsgJp: 魔物の活性を抑える術があればいいのだが
MsgEn:
If there is a way to suppress the enemy's
activity, that would be great.

MsgJp: あら、ご機嫌いかがですか？
MsgEn: Oh, how are you feeling?

MsgJp: 癒し手の需要は増える一方です
MsgEn: The demand for healers continues to increase.

MsgJp: あなたの旅によき導きがありますように
MsgEn: May you have a good guidance on your journey

MsgJp: あなたの旅によき導きがありますように
MsgEn: May you have a good guidance on your journey

MsgJp: 今日があるのも、白竜さまのおかげでございます
MsgEn:
Today's existence is also thanks to The White
Dragon

MsgJp: 任務、ご苦労様です覚者様
MsgEn: Thank you for your hard work, Arisen.

MsgJp: あなたの旅によき導きがありますように
MsgEn: May you have a good guidance on your journey

MsgJp: 今日があるのも、白竜さまのおかげですね
MsgEn:
Today's existence is also thanks to The White
Dragon, isn't it

MsgJp: お仕事頑張ってくださいませ、覚者さま
MsgEn: Good luck with your work, Arisen

MsgJp: よし、その調子で修練を重ねろよ！
MsgEn: Okay, keep up the practice!

MsgJp:
技は一日にしてならず！
ひとつひとつ身に付けていくんだ
MsgEn:
Skill does not come in a day! You have to learn
each one step by step.

MsgJp:
訓練にやりすぎはないぞ
じっくり実戦前に稽古していけ！
MsgEn:
There's no such thing as too much training. Take
your time and practice before the actual battle!

MsgJp: おう、訓練について質問か？
MsgEn: Oh, do you have any questions about the training?

MsgJp:
白竜に選ばれし覚者様――
古の武器についてであれば、お力になれるかと
MsgEn:
Master Arisen, chosen by the White Dragon - If
it's about ancient weapons, I can be of
assistance.

MsgJp:
人が武器を選ぶばかりではなく――
時として、武器が人を選ぶこともありましょう
MsgEn:
It's not only humans who choose weapons -
Sometimes, weapons also choose their wielders.

MsgJp: どうか貴方様も、それをお忘れなく
MsgEn: Please do not forget that

MsgJp:
武器とは、討つべきものの数だけ
それに相応しき“かたち”があるもの――
MsgEn:
A weapon has as many forms as there are things to
kill.

MsgJp:
竜の敵となりうるおそろしき魔を退けるには
手に持つ刃もまた、特別でなければなりません
MsgEn:
To repel the fearsome demons that can become
enemies of the dragon, the blades we wield must
also be special.

MsgJp:
遠き古より流れ伝わる智――
覚者の、そしてポーンの民の――
MsgEn:
From ancient times, the wisdom that has been
passed down continues to flow— Of the Arisen, and
the people known as Pawns—

MsgJp:
戦徒が、自ら主の剣となり鎧となるために
より良き剣や鎧を生まんとするは
必然ではないでしょうか――
MsgEn:
Is it not necessary for a Myrmidion to seek
better weapons and armor, to become their own
Masters sword and shield?

MsgJp: おう、調査の進捗はどうだ？
MsgEn: Oh, how's the investigation going?

MsgJp:
辺りをぐるっと歩いてみたが
この島の生態系はレスタニアとは
えらく違うようだな
MsgEn:
I walked around the area and the ecosystem of
this island seems to be very different from
Lestania.

MsgJp:
いつ、どんな魔物が飛び出してくるかわからんぞ
とっさの状況にも対処できるよう
装備や持ち物は常に見直しておけよ
調査探索の基本だ！
MsgEn:
You never know when and what kind of creatures
will come at you. Always review your equipment and
items so you can handle any situation that arises.
It's the fundamentals of exploration and
investigation!

MsgJp:
この魔赤島調査隊は精鋭揃いだ
難しい任務ではあるが、士気も高い
――俺か？　俺も久しぶりに勇み立ってるな！
MsgEn:
This Bloodbane Isle expedition team is comprised
of elite members. Although it is a difficult
mission, their morale is high. ――As for me? I'm
also feeling a surge of courage after a long time!

MsgJp:
前はグリッテン砦の防衛戦に参加していたんだが
モゴックの奴が墜ちてからは
いまいち張り合いが無くてな――
MsgEn:
I used to be involved in the defense of Fort
Gritten, but since that Mogok guy went down, I
haven't had the same level of excitement--the
competition has really been lacking.

MsgJp:
ここのエリアマスター就任の打診を受けた時は
これぞ、と思ったものだ！
MsgEn:
When I received the offer to become an Area
Master here, I thought, "This is it!"

MsgJp:
見ての通り、この駐屯地は臨時のものだ
だが、調査のために必要なものについては
それなりの質のものを集めている
MsgEn:
As you can see, this base is temporary but we
have gathered the necessary equipment for the
investigation.

MsgJp:
質だけじゃなく、数もきっちり揃えてあるぞ！
お前の部下たちにも遠慮なく使うよう
言っておいてくれ
MsgEn:
Not only the quantity, but also the quality is
meticulous! Please tell your subordinates to use
it without hesitation.

MsgJp:
おう、来たな！
あらためて自己紹介しておこうか
魔赤島調査隊、隊長のベルトランだ
この島のエリアマスターも兼任している
MsgEn:
Oh, you've arrived! Let me introduce myself
again. I'm Bertrand, the captain of the Bloodbane
Isle research team. I'm also the Area Master of
this island.

MsgJp:
エリアマスターとは言っても
こんな状況だ
まだ何一つわからんがな！
まずは拠点を一通り設営したところだ
MsgEn:
Even though I say I'm an Area Master, the
situation is like this. I still don't understand
anything! First, I have to set up the base.

MsgJp:
――そう不安そうな顔をするな！
島の全体像を早期に探るべく
身軽な人員を俺直属の斥候隊として
連れてきたから安心してくれ！
MsgEn:
Don't look so worried! I've brought a team of
agile individuals as my direct reconnaissance unit
to swiftly explore the entire island. So, rest
assured!

MsgJp:
彼らにはなるべく戦闘を避けさせ
島の地形や魔物の生息状況を
重点的に探らせていく予定だ
MsgEn:
We'll have them avoid combat as much as possible,
and focus on exploring the island's terrain and
demonic inhabitants.

MsgJp:
そして、斥候隊を始めとする
各部隊からの情報を統括したり
調査の方向性を監督するのが俺の仕事ってわけだ
MsgEn:
And so, my job involves overseeing information
from various units, including the scout team, and
supervising the direction of the investigation.

MsgJp:
監督といっても
お前たちはそれぞれの判断で
調査を進めてくれて構わん！
ジョゼフ様直々のお達しだ
MsgEn:
Speaking of the overseer, each of you can proceed
with the investigation based on your own judgment!
This is a direct order from Joseph himself.

MsgJp:
俺もこの拠点で大人しくしているつもりは無いぞ！
この未知の状況、己の実力を計るには
絶好のチャンスだ！　腕が鳴るな！
MsgEn:
I don't intend to sit still at this base either!
In this unknown situation, it's the perfect
opportunity to test my abilities. I'm itching to
go!

MsgJp:
調査の進捗はどうだ？
支援品を割り当てておいたから
持っていくといい
今後の働きに期待してるぞ！
MsgEn:
How is the progress of the investigation? I have
allocated support items, so it would be good to
bring them along. I am expecting great work from
you in the future!

MsgJp:
調査の成果が出始めているな
厳しい状況に変わりはないが
この調子で進めていこう
MsgEn:
The results of the investigation are beginning to
show, but the situation remains severe. Let's
continue in this way.

MsgJp:
お前の隊もいつも頑張ってくれている
支援品を少し大目に持っていくといい
今後も期待してるぞ！
MsgEn:
Your squad always does a great job, too.
You can take a little extra support supplies with
you!
I'm looking forward to seeing more of you in the
future!

MsgJp:
ふむ、この調査隊の中でも
ずば抜けた動きをしているのが
お前の隊だろう！
さすがはジョゼフ様のお墨付きだ！
MsgEn:
Hmmm, of all these survey teams, the one that
stands out from the rest is yours!
That's what I'm talking about, Masters Joseph's
endorsement!

MsgJp:
走り回ればそれだけ消耗もしているだろう
支援品の割り当てを増やしておくから
遠慮せずに持っていってくれ
MsgEn:
If you keep running around, you'll exhaust
yourself even more.
I'll increase the allocation of support items, so
please don't hesitate to take them.

MsgJp:
それにしても、拠点にできるような
状態の良い洞窟を早々に発見できたのは
本当に幸運だったな！
MsgEn:
Regardless, being able to quickly discover a cave
in such a good condition, that could serve as a
base was truly fortunate!

MsgJp:
島の南の方にある洞窟を知っているか？
調査隊内では《不浄の掃き溜め》と
呼んでいる洞窟だ
MsgEn:
Do you know about the cave located in the
southern part of the island? Within our expedition
team, we refer to it as the "Cesspool of Filth".

MsgJp:
実はあそこも、この洞窟と同時期に
発見していたんだが
ここと違って、内部が凄まじい状態でな
MsgEn:
Actually, we also discovered that place around
the same time as this cave.
But unlike here, the interior is in a terrible
state.

MsgJp:
何らかの肉食獣が棲みついていたのか
そこら辺に腐った死肉が散乱して――
臭いもそれはひどいもんだった！
MsgEn:
Some kind of predator was living in the area.
There was rotting dead meat scattered around--
and the smell was terrible!

MsgJp:
奥に肉食獣が潜伏しているのを予感して
早期に封鎖しておいたんだが、
お前の実力があれば探索できそうだ
MsgEn:
I had a hunch there was a predator lurking in the
back,
so I sealed it off early.
I'm sure you could explore it if you're up to it.

MsgJp:
もし臭いが気にならない性質なら
内部を探索しに行ってみてくれ
MsgEn:
If it's in your nature to not mind the smell, go
and explore the interior.

MsgJp:
そういえば、ここから西に行ったところに
開けた土地があるんだが知っているか？
調査隊では《滝を臨む蝕地》と呼んでいるが――
MsgEn:
By the way, do you know that there is an open
piece of land if you go west from here? The survey
team calls it "Corrupted Ground Facing the
Waterfall".

MsgJp:
あそこには以前から
侵食ゴブリンどもがうろついていたんだが
最近、数が増えて大きな群れになっているようだ
MsgEn:
There have been corruptions, infected goblins
wandering around over there for a while, but
recently, their number has increased and they seem
to have formed a large herd.

MsgJp:
元がゴブリンとはいえ
侵食の作用で凶暴化している上に
数がいると中々厄介だぞ
侮って痛い目を見ないよう気を付けてくれ
MsgEn:
Even though they are goblins, they become even
more aggressive due to the corrupting effect, and
it can be troublesome when there are many of them.
Be careful not to underestimate them and suffer
the consequences.

MsgJp:
ちょうどいいタイミングで来てくれた！
お前に頼みたいことがあってな
MsgEn:
You came just in time!
I have a favor to ask you.

MsgJp:
この拠点から南西の方角の海岸沿いに
古い地下聖堂のような場所が見つかってな
封鎖されていたが、先日ようやく開けることができた
MsgEn:
From this base, a place resembling an old
underground cathedral was discovered along the
southwestern coast. It had been sealed off, but
was finally able to be opened the other day.

MsgJp:
中は水が流れていて静かな雰囲気だ――
俺たちは《せせらぎの地下聖堂》と呼んでいる
まぁ、実際に聖堂として使われていたのかは
定かではないが――
MsgEn:
Inside, water is flowing, creating a serene
atmosphere—
We call it the "Crypt of Murmurs."
Well, it's unclear whether it was actually used
as a sanctuary—
but it has a holy land-like ambiance.

MsgJp:
この島には珍しく、文化的な造形物が
数多く残されているようだ
あそこを探ることで、何か得るものが
あるんじゃないかと思ってな
MsgEn:
Unusually for this island, there seems to be a
great number of cultural structures that have been
preserved. I believe there may be something to
gain by exploring there.

MsgJp:
だが、内部には危険度の高い
魔物が徘徊していて、
相応の戦力を持った者でないと
とても調査は任せられん
MsgEn:
However, within, there are highly dangerous
enemies wandering around, and unless one possesses
sufficient fighting power, I cannot entrust the
investigation to them.

MsgJp:
そこで、お前に頼みたいというわけだ
調査に向かうタイミングは任せよう
準備ができたら、また声をかけてくれ！
MsgEn:
That's why I'm asking for your help. I'll leave
it to you to decide when to head out to
investigate. When you're ready, give me a call
again!

MsgJp:
各隊員の尽力によって
この島の調査も進みつつあるな！
中でもお前の隊の働きは格別だ！
MsgEn:
Thanks to the efforts of each team member,
the investigation of this island is progressing!
Your team's work, in particular, is exceptional!

MsgJp:
この状況では中々報いてやることもできないが
せめて支援品の割り当てだけでも
増やせるように手配しておこう！
MsgEn:
In this situation, it may not be possible to
retaliate right away, but let's at least make
arrangements to increase the allocation of aid
supplies!

MsgJp:
この島に一つ、塔があるだろう
《聖遺の塔》と呼ばれているあそこだ
あの近くに古い井戸があってな
MsgEn:
There should be one tower on this island, it's
called the "Sage Tower Ruins". There is an old
well near there.

MsgJp:
井戸蓋の部分が錆び付いていて
開けられなかったんだが
この間、ようやくこじ開けることができた
MsgEn:
The part of the well cover was rusted and
couldn't be opened, but recently, I was finally
able to pry it open.

MsgJp:
中の探索までは中々手が回っていないが
もしお前の手が空いていたら
覗いてみても損は無いだろう
MsgEn:
I haven't gotten around to exploring inside, but
if you're available, it wouldn't hurt to take a
peek.

MsgJp:
北の方の沿岸に、肉食の魔物が集まりやすい
開けた土地があるのを知っているか？
獲物の死肉が溜め込まれている広場だ
MsgEn:
Did you know that there is an open area of land
on the northern coast where carnivorous creatures
tend to congregate?
It's a square where the carcasses of their prey
are stored.

MsgJp:
先日、あの広場に
新手のナイトメアが舞い降りたんだが
隊士を討伐に向かわせてみても、飛び回る上に
歌ったり叫んだりで手に負えんらしい
MsgEn:
The other day, a new nightmare landed in that
plaza.
I sent a squad to take it down, but they were
flying around, singing and screaming and it was
too much for them to handle.

MsgJp:
ナイトメアの声には
特殊な魔力が込められているからな
あの辺りに近づく時は注意してくれ
MsgEn:
The voice of the Nightmare contains a special
kind of magic, so be cautious when getting close
to that area.

MsgJp:
そうだ、お前にも話しておこう
この島に来て最初に調査することになった
《侵食魔の巣窟》の奥に
更なる空間が広がっていたのを覚えているか？
MsgEn:
That's right, I should tell you too. When I first
came to this island, I was assigned to investigate
the depths of the "Infected Den". Do you remember
that there was a further expanse beyond it?

MsgJp:
予想以上に侵食が進んでいたことから
一旦は俺の判断で封鎖していたんだが
島全体の調査も進んできたことを考えて
そろそろ封鎖を解こうと思ってな
MsgEn:
The Corruption had progressed more than
anticipated, so I temporarily sealed it off based
on my judgment. However, considering that the
investigation of the entire island has also
progressed, I think it's about time to lift the
blockade.

MsgJp:
奥は侵食が進み
特に強力な侵食魔が巣食っていることは
まず間違いないだろう
MsgEn:
The depths have been corrupted, and there is no
doubt that a powerful infected demon is nesting
there.

MsgJp:
調査に入る時は
くれぐれも警戒を怠らないように
抗侵薬の予備も豊富に用意して向かってくれ
MsgEn:
When entering the investigation, please be
extremely cautious and do not neglect your
vigilance. Please also bring ample supplies of
Anti-Corruption Medicine with you.

MsgJp:
ちょっとばかりマズい状況になってきてな
“侵食”の進行スピードがこちらの予想を
上回っているようだ――
MsgEn:
The situation is becoming a bit troublesome. The
speed of Corruption seems to be surpassing our
expectations.

MsgJp:
《翼風高原》に
侵食ゴアサイクロプスが現れたんだが
こいつがまた派手に侵食が進んだ個体だ
MsgEn:
An "Infected Goreclops" has appeared in the Wing
Wind Plateau, and this individual's infection has
advanced quite dramatically.

MsgJp:
“侵食核”って呼び名らしいが、とにかく頭に
イバラみたいなものを２本も生やしてやがる
あれは体に回りきった毒が
行き場を失って噴きだしたような状態だ
MsgEn:
It's called the "Corruption Core," it's got two
thorny appendages sticking out of it. It's like
the poison in the body has run out of places to go
and started to burst out.

MsgJp:
侵食が進んだ魔物は凶暴性が増すのは
前に説明した通りだが
あそこまで侵食が進んでしまうと
もう別種の魔物と考えた方がいいだろうな――
MsgEn:
As I explained before, when a monster's
corruption advances, its aggressiveness increases.
However, when the corruption has progressed to
that extent, it might be better to consider it as
a different species of creature altogether.

MsgJp:
ともかく、あれは並の隊士に任せるわけにはいかない
かと言って、調査の妨げになる恐れから
放置するのも気がかりだ
MsgEn:
Anyway, leaving it to ordinary squad members
isn't an option, but at the same time, I'm
concerned that it might hinder the investigation.

MsgJp:
頼めるのであれば、お前に討伐を
任せたいんだが――
引き受けてくれるのであれば
あらためて詳細を説明しよう
MsgEn:
If it's possible to rely on you, I would like to
entrust the subjugation to you... If you are
willing to accept, let me explain the details
again.

MsgJp:
お前の隊の目覚ましい働きには
まったく舌を巻くばかりだ！
さすがはレオの後任と期待されるだけあるな！
MsgEn:
The remarkable work of your squad is absolutely
mind-blowing!
You are indeed the expected successor to Leo!

MsgJp:
本当はもっときちんと報いてやりたいものだが
この島では手に入るものに限りがあるからな――
その中でも一際良い物が
お前の隊に回るよう手配しよう
MsgEn:
I actually want to reward you more properly, but
there are limitations to what can be obtained on
this island. Among those, I will arrange for
something particularly good to be allocated to
your squad.

MsgJp:
これからもその調子で調査を進めてくれ
頼りにしているぞ！
MsgEn:
Keep up the good work and keep up the research.
I'm counting on you!

MsgJp:
橋を渡ったところに大きな坑道跡があるのは
もう知っているか？
MsgEn:
There is a large mine site across the bridge. Do
you already know about it?

MsgJp:
古い坑道は崩落が怖いからな
安全確保のために今まで封鎖していたが
地盤もそう脆くはないようだから
封鎖を解くことにした
MsgEn:
Because there is fear of collapse in the old
tunnels, We have been sealing them off for safety
measures. However, since the ground doesn't seem
to be too weak, We have decided to lift the seal.

MsgJp:
お前には一足先に教えておこう
前人未踏の場所を探索してみたければ
今が絶好の機会だぞ！
MsgEn:
Let me tell you in advance; If you want to
explore uncharted territory, now is a great
opportunity!

MsgJp:
西の方に水量の多い洞窟があってな
恐らくあそこが辺り一帯の
水源になってるんだろう
MsgEn:
There is a cave with a lot of water to the west.
It is likely that it is the source of water in
this area.

MsgJp:
中に入ると四方八方から滝の音が聞こえて
方向感覚を失いそうになるくらいだ
調査隊では《滝鳴洞穴》と呼んでいる
MsgEn:
Once inside, you can hear the sound of the
waterfall from all directions and almost lose your
sense of direction. The survey team calls it
"Waterfall Echo Cavern."

MsgJp:
この島は全体的に水が豊富な印象だが
《滝鳴洞穴》は別格だぞ
MsgEn:
I get the impression that water is plentiful on
this island as a whole, but Waterfall Echo Cavern
is something else!

MsgJp:
暗い洞窟内で流される危険性や
滝の存在を考慮して封鎖していたが、
お前にはそんな心配は要らんな
MsgEn:
We had it sealed off due to the danger of being
swept away in the dark cave and the presence of
waterfalls, but you don't need to worry about
that.

MsgJp:
封鎖を解いておこう
一度行ってみてくれ
MsgEn:
Let's lift the blockade; Please go and see for
yourself.

MsgJp:
ふむ――
最近は侵食のペースが以前にも増して
早まっているように思わないか？
MsgEn:
Hmm... Don't you think that the rate of
corruption has been increasing recently?

MsgJp:
この間、《菌糸の襲窟》と呼んでいる洞窟の
初期調査が終わったんだが
内部もかなり侵食が進んでいて
そこらへん菌胞だらけになってやがってな
MsgEn:
Recently, we finished the initial investigation
of a cave known as the "Fungal Colony Caves," but
the interior is heavily corrupted. The place is
filled with fungal spores.

MsgJp:
斥候に行った隊士も
あらかじめ抗侵薬を飲んでから向かったそうだ
MsgEn:
Even the troopers who went scouting took
Anti-Corruption Medicine before they went.

MsgJp:
実際はそこまでするほどではないんだが
気持ちはわからんでもない有様だ――
MsgEn:
In reality, it might not be as bad as it seems,
but I can understand the concern about it.

MsgJp:
当然、侵食魔もウヨウヨしている
お前も《菌糸の襲窟》に向かう時は
抗侵薬を忘れずに持っていくようにな
MsgEn:
Of course, the infected creatures are also
crawling about. When you head towards the Fungal
Colony Caves, make sure to bring the
Anti-Corruption Medicine with you.

MsgJp:
ううむ――
いや、少しばかり悩ましい事態になってな
MsgEn:
Hmm... Well, it seems that things have become
somewhat troubling.

MsgJp:
《菌糸の襲窟》の奥に、侵食ベヘモットが
潜んでいることがわかったんだが
こいつが厄介で――
すでに３人の隊士が負傷して帰ったほどだ
MsgEn:
We discovered that a Corrupted Behemoth lurks in
the depths of the "Fungal Colony Caves", and it's
a troublesome one. Three squad members have
already returned injured because of it.

MsgJp:
本来であれば俺が向かいたいところだが
ストックしてある医療物資が
底を尽きかけていることもあって、
物資の確保が何よりの急務になってしまった
MsgEn:
Normally, I would have headed there myself, but
our stock of medical supplies is running out, and
securing supplies has become a matter of the
utmost urgency.

MsgJp:
医療物資の確保も無しに
隊士を討伐に送り出したり、
まして一人討伐に飛び出したとなっては
間違いなくクラリッサに文句を言われるからな――
MsgEn:
Sending squad members to face this threat without
securing medical supplies, let alone heading out
to face it alone, will definitely earn me a
scolding from Clarissa.

MsgJp:
そうだ
お前、クラリッサに内緒で
あの侵食ベヘモットを
討伐してきてくれないか？
MsgEn:
Yeah. Can you, without letting Clarissa know, go
and defeat that Corrupted Behemoth for us?

MsgJp:
今までも大型の侵食魔を何体も
相手にしてきたお前なら、きっと倒せるはずだ！
こんな大物とやり合う機会もそう無いぞ！
どうだ？　気になったらあらためて声をかけてくれ
MsgEn:
You've faced numerous large Corrupted Beasts in
the past, and I believe you can defeat it!
Opportunities to challenge such a formidable foe
are rare. So, what do you say? If you're
interested, let me know, and we can discuss it
further.

MsgJp:
良いニュースがあるぞ！
調査が進んだことで
レスタニアからの物資を運ぶルートの整備も
ずいぶんと捗ってな！
MsgEn:
I have good news! With the progress of the
investigation, the maintenance of the route for
transporting supplies from Lestania is coming
along quite well!

MsgJp:
今後はより良い支援物資が安定して
送られてくるそうだ
これで、お前の隊も少しは楽になるだろう
MsgEn:
They're going to be sending a steady stream of
better relief supplies from now on.
This should make things a little easier on your
squad.

MsgJp:
それにしても、お前がいなければ
今頃この島の調査もここまでは進んで
いなかっただろう！
MsgEn:
Still, without you, we wouldn't have made this
much progress in our survey of the island by now!

MsgJp:
魔赤島調査にかける熱意、そして実力――
どれをとっても抜きんでた働きだ！
今後も期待しているぞ！
MsgEn:
The passion and skills dedicated to the
investigation of Bloodbane Isle are exceptional!
We are expecting great things in the future!

MsgJp:
俺のところに来るとはな――
話を聞こうじゃないか
MsgEn:
You've come to see me. Well, let's hear what you
have to say.

MsgJp:
自分が無知であることを知るのは難しいことだ
「己の無知を知っている」と思うこと自体が
そうでないことの証明かも知れないだろう
MsgEn:
It is difficult to know that one is ignorant.
Thinking "I know my own ignorance" might be
evidence that it is not so.

MsgJp:
世界は一つではない――
こう聞いた時、お前は何を思う？
MsgEn:
There is more than one world. What do you think
when you hear this?

MsgJp:
自分の知らない国があるかも知れないと思うか？
それとも人々の相互理解の難しさを考えるか？
あるいは自分には見えない何かの存在を信じるか？
MsgEn:
Do you think that there might be countries you
don't know? Or do you think about the difficulty
of mutual understanding among people? Or do you
believe in the existence of something that you
can't see?

MsgJp:
お前の見ている世界と
俺の見ている世界は違うかもしれないぜ
MsgEn: Then don't hesitate, come here anytime.

MsgJp:
それを見ている人間が違うんだから
目に映る世界自体が違うと言えなくもないだろう
MsgEn:
Since the person looking at it is different, it
could be said that the world itself that is
reflected in the eyes is different.

MsgJp:
お前はもっとたくさんのことを
知るようになるだろう――
MsgEn: You will come to know more things.

MsgJp:
知識が増える、といったことじゃない
お前の目はたくさんの世界を見ることになる――
そう、何かを追い求める限りな
MsgEn:
It's not about gaining knowledge, Your eyes will
see many worlds— Yes, as long as you pursue
something.

MsgJp:
お前の身体はひとつだ――
いかな勇者とてそれは変わらない
MsgEn:
Your body is one, and no amount of bravery will
change that.

MsgJp:
まずは、挑むべき試練に集中するべきだ
慌てる事はない
MsgEn:
First, we should focus on the trials we need to
take on. No need to panic.

MsgJp: これはこれは、レスタニアの覚者様
MsgEn: Well met, Arisen of Lestania.

MsgJp:
レスタニアの方の目には
フィンダムはどのように映るのですか？
MsgEn: How does Phindym appear to the people of Lestania?

MsgJp:
私はフィンダムが気に入っていますよ
いえ、他の地に赴いたことはありませんが――
MsgEn:
I like Phindym. No, I have never been to another
country—

MsgJp:
ここを離れることはおろか
フィンダム以外の地があることすら知りませんでした
私にとっての唯一の場所なのです
MsgEn:
Not only leaving this place, but I didn't even
know that there were other places besides Phindym.
It is the only place for me.

MsgJp:
視線が気になりますか？
何せ我々はレスタニアの人々を初めて見るもので――
MsgEn:
Are you concerned about the stares? After all, we
are seeing the people of Lestania for the first
time.

MsgJp: ん？　何か用かな？
MsgEn: Hmm? Do you need something?

MsgJp:
レスタニア――
不思議な響きだな
新鮮な感じがするよ
MsgEn:
Lestania— It has a mysterious sound, It feels
fresh.

MsgJp:
僕は旅好きでね
親には良い顔をされなかったけど
しばらくダナを離れて色んなところを回ったんだ
MsgEn:
I love traveling, you know. Even though my
parents didn't approve of it, I traveled to
various places for a while, leaving Dana behind.

MsgJp:
いつかレスタニアにも行ってみたいものだな
自分の知らない場所があると思うと
それだけでワクワクしてくるよ
MsgEn:
I would like to visit Lestania someday. It
excites me just thinking about unknown places.

MsgJp:
いつか、レスタニアの話を
ゆっくり聞かせてくれ
君らの手が空いた時でいい
MsgEn:
One day, when you have a moment, please take your
time to tell me about Lestania.

MsgJp: あっ、レスタニアの覚者さん！
MsgEn: Ah, Lestania's Ser Arisen!

MsgJp:
ボク、鳥を飼ってたんだ
でも連れてこられなくて――
元気にしてるかなぁ――
MsgEn:
I used to have a bird, but I couldn't bring it
with me... I wonder if it's doing well...

MsgJp:
ボクもおばあちゃんも、別の村に住んでたんだ
侵食のせいで住めなくなっちゃって――
それでここに逃げてきたんだよ
MsgEn:
Both me and my grandmother were living in a
different village. We couldn't live there anymore,
because of the corruption. That's why we came here
to escape.

MsgJp:
おばあちゃんはいつか帰れるっていうけど
ホントかな――
MsgEn:
They say grandma will come home someday. I wonder
if that's true—

MsgJp:
角が珍しい？
触ってもいいよ
MsgEn:
Is it unusual to have horns? You can touch if you
want.

MsgJp:
――レスタニアの人って
角が無くて困らないの？
何かスカスカした感じ、しない？
MsgEn:
ーーDon't people from Lestania have horns?
Don't they feel strange without them?
Do they feel empty or something?

MsgJp:
最近は変なことばかり――
これから一体どうなるんだろうね――
MsgEn:
Lately, there have been nothing but strange
things happening - I wonder what will happen from
now on.

MsgJp:
おぞましい魔物が現れたり、
異世界の覚者が来たり――
一体どうなっているのやら
MsgEn:
Hideous monsters appear,
Arisen ones from another world come--
What on is happening?

MsgJp:
いえ、あなた方を悪く言うつもりはなくてね
ただ、心配なだけで――
MsgEn:
No, I don't intend to speak ill of you all. I'm
just worried, that's all...

MsgJp:
私はね、私の家族を守りたいんだよ
孫を守るためならなんだってするし
孫を連れてどこまでも逃げるよ
MsgEn:
I, you know, I want to protect my family. I'll do
anything to protect my grandchildren. I'll run
away with my grandchildren anywhere.

MsgJp:
心配性かも知れないけど、
何よりも孫が大切なんだ――
誰にだってそういうもの、あるだろ？
MsgEn:
I may be anxious, but above all, my grandchildren
are important— Everyone has something like that,
don't they?

MsgJp:
大切なものを守りたいっていう気持ちは
誰にだってあるものさ
失ってしまったら自分がどうなるかわからない
そんな大切なものが――
MsgEn:
The feeling of wanting to protect something
important is something that everyone has. If we
were to lose it, we wouldn't know what would
become of ourselves. That's how precious it is -

MsgJp:
あら、レスタニアの方
河を渡りたいのかしら？
MsgEn:
Oh, you're the one from Lestania. Want to cross
the river?

MsgJp:
トレアサにはもうお会いになった？
彼女、少し人見知りなんだけど
本当はとっても良い人なのよ
真面目で、温厚で、仕事熱心で――
MsgEn:
Have you met Toreasa already? She's a bit shy,
but she's actually a very nice person. She's
diligent, gentle, and dedicated to her work.

MsgJp:
ここ、エラン水林は
綺麗なところでしょう？
空気も清浄で――
MsgEn:
Here; Elan Water Grove is a beautiful place,
right? The air is also clean――

MsgJp:
やっぱり水が多いからなのかしら？
ね、船の上で深呼吸してみて
きっと気持ちがいいわ
MsgEn:
Is it because there is a lot of water after all?
Well, try taking a deep breath on the boat. It
will surely feel good.

MsgJp:
はぁ、何だかお腹減ってきちゃった――
結構力仕事なのよねぇ
MsgEn:
Ugh, I'm starting to get hungry... It's quite a
physically demanding job, you know.

MsgJp: 何か御用？
MsgEn: Do you need something?

MsgJp:
ミューセルお姉様は、その、ちょっと――
考え事や調べ物に熱中されがちだから
わたしができることはお手伝いしてるの
MsgEn:
Sister Musel tends to be a bit—absorbed in her
thoughts and research, so I try to help where I
can.

MsgJp:
あまりミューセルお姉様の手を
煩わせることはしないでね
MsgEn: Please don't bother Suster Muselle too much

MsgJp:
わたしがミューセルお姉様の弟子なのかって？
違うわ
――そうなれたらいいんだけど
MsgEn:
Am I Sister Musel's disciple? No, that's not it.
――I wish I could be though.

MsgJp:
狭いところだけど、旅人さん用の寝床もあるの
お代として<VAL PRICE_INN>もらうけど
いいかしら？
MsgEn:
It's a small place, but there is a sleeping space
for travelers as well. I will take <VAL PRICE_INN>
as payment, is that okay with you?

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: Yes

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: No

MsgJp:
旅人さん用の寝床も
毎日ちゃんと整えてるのよ
泊まっていくの？
MsgEn:
We also have a sleeping area for travelers and we
set it up properly every day.
Are you staying the night?

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: Yes

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: No

MsgJp:
《弱化の治療》、ね！
ミューセルお姉様に教えてもらったから
ちゃんとできるはず――！
お代は<VAL PRICE_WEAK>よ、どうする？
MsgEn:
"Treat Weakness," right? I learned it from Miss
Musel, so I should be able to do it properly!
It'll cost you <VAL PRICE_WEAK>. What do you say?

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: Yes

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: No

MsgJp:
うーん？
弱化してないみたいだけど――
気分が優れないなら
少し休んでいくのはどうかしら
MsgEn:
Huh? It seems you're not weakened, but if you're
not feeling well, maybe taking a little rest would
be a good idea.

MsgJp:
レスタニアの覚者か
どうかしたか？
MsgEn:
Is it the Arisen of Lestania? Is there something
wrong?

MsgJp:
レスタニアには覚者がたくさんいるって？
――レスタニアの竜は、覚者を一人に
選びきれなかったのか？
MsgEn:
Are there many Arisen in Lestania? - The dragon
of Lestania couldn't choose just one Arisen?

MsgJp:
俺は覚者ではないが、
精霊竜とフィンダムを守るための
鍛練は欠かしたことがない
MsgEn:
I may not be an Arisen, but I've never neglected
my training to protect the Spirit Dragon and
Phindym.

MsgJp:
覚者こそは竜に選ばれし者だが、
選ばれなくたって竜を敬う気持ちに
変わりはないからな
MsgEn:
Arisen are the ones chosen by the dragons, But
even if you're not chosen, the feeling of
respecting the dragons does not change, you know.

MsgJp:
何だ？　俺が珍しいのか？
ここではお前たちの方がよっぽど珍しいが――
MsgEn:
What is it? I'm unusual? You're much rarer here
than I am, but...

MsgJp: よぉ！　何か用かね？
MsgEn: Yo!　What can I do for you?

MsgJp:
フィンダムの飯はどうだ？
口に合うといいんだがな
MsgEn:
How's the food in Phindym? I hope it suits your
taste.

MsgJp: 腹減ったな――
MsgEn: I'm hungry――

MsgJp:
ダナ村ってところがあってな、
そこらへんで採れる野菜は味が濃くてウマイ！
なんというか、力強い味だ
MsgEn:
There is a place called Dana Village. The
vegetables that grow around there have a rich and
delicious taste! It's kind of like a strong and
powerful flavor.

MsgJp:
腹いっぱい食ってこそ、
この筋肉も仕事する気になってくれるってもんよ
MsgEn:
Only if you eat a full meal will these muscles be
willing to work!

MsgJp: レスタニアの覚者か――
MsgEn: Ser Arisen of Lestania—

MsgJp:
何か用か？
手合せしたいというなら、手加減はしない
MsgEn:
Do you have any business? If you want to play, I
won't go easy.

MsgJp:
魔物にできた腫れ物のような、
寄生植物のような――
あの気持ちが悪いものを見たか？
MsgEn:
Did you see that grotesque, tumor-like thing? It
looks like a parasitic plant, resembling an enemy?

MsgJp:
どうやら、ああなると正気を失ってしまうようだ
気を付けたいものだな
MsgEn:
Apparently, you lose your mind when you get like
that. I'd watch out for that.

MsgJp:
魔物を異形化させるアレ――
実は、我々もアレを発症する可能性があるらしい
あんな惨い姿にはなりたくないな――
MsgEn:
That thing that deforms demons—Actually, I heard
that we can develop it too. I don't want to look
that miserable—

MsgJp: あら、レスタニアの方ね？
MsgEn: Oh, you're from Lestania, aren't you?

MsgJp:
実は、侵食魔のあの腫れ物のようなアレ――
プリーストの祈りによって治らないか
試してみたことがあるのよ
MsgEn:
Actually, I have tried to see if the swelling,
like a tumor caused by corruption, can be healed
by the prayers of a Priest. No luck there though.

MsgJp: まぁ、治らなかったわね
MsgEn: Well, it just didn't heal.

MsgJp:
侵食魔にばかり目をとられがちだけど
植物や土の状態もひどいものよ
MsgEn: White Dragon, please get well!

MsgJp:
侵食魔が噴き出しているあの“胞子”――
あまり吸い込まないようにした方がいいわ
MsgEn:
Those "spores" of the corrupting demon are
erupting— It's better not to inhale them too much.

MsgJp:
――レスタニアの覚者ですね
船に乗りたいのですか？
MsgEn:
You're an Arisen of Lestania. Do you want to
board the ship?

MsgJp:
モルは少し変わったところがあるでしょう？
人の話をあまり聞いていないように見えたり
なぜかいつもお腹を空かせていたり――
MsgEn:
Moles are a little different, aren't they? It
seems like they don't listen to people's stories
much and they're always hungry for some reason—

MsgJp:
良い子なんですけどね
あれで中々しっかりしているんですよ
MsgEn:
They're a good kid, though. They're quite
reliable with that.

MsgJp:
――なんですか
あまりジロジロ見ても
いいことはないですよ
MsgEn: — What is it? Staring too much won't do any good.

MsgJp:
川のそばだから、この辺りはひんやりするでしょう
涼むにはぴったりなんです
MsgEn:
Because it's by the river, this area will be
cool, won't it? It's perfect for cooling off.

MsgJp:
あっ、覚者さま！？
自分にご用でしょうか？
MsgEn: Ah, Ser Arisen! Do you have any business with me?

MsgJp:
本日はお日柄もよく――
って、何を言っているんだ、俺は
MsgEn:
The sun is shining today—What am I saying, I'm
not...

MsgJp:
い、いえいえ！
ちょっと緊張してしまいまして！
MsgEn: No, no, no! I was a little nervous!

MsgJp: すみません、何をお話すれば良いのやら――
MsgEn: I'm sorry, I don't know what to tell you--

MsgJp: ん？　ああ、覚者さまじゃないですか
MsgEn: Hm? Oh, it's the Arisen.

MsgJp:
アッカーシェランに力を貸してくださり
ありがとうございます
MsgEn:
Thank you for lending your strength to Acre
Selund.

MsgJp:
この先平和になったらでいいんです
いつか、レスタニアのことを教えてください
MsgEn:
Just when there's peace down the road. Someday,
please tell us about Lestania.

MsgJp: ――そろそろ動く頃でしょうか
MsgEn: I wonder if it's time to start moving soon.

MsgJp: やあ、元気かい？
MsgEn: Hey, how are you doing?

MsgJp:
堅苦しいことは嫌いでね
なんでこの任務に呼ばれたんだろう
MsgEn:
I don't like to do anything too formal. I don't
know why I was called for this assignment.

MsgJp: そろそろ一息つきたいもんだ
MsgEn: I'd like to take a break soon.

MsgJp:
覚者さんも疲れたら
ちょっと休みなよ
MsgEn:
When you're tired, Master Arisen; Take a little
break.

MsgJp: よう、どうした？
MsgEn: Hey, what's up?

MsgJp:
自分から盗賊に話しかけて
アンタにマズいことは無いのか？
MsgEn:
Talk to the bandit yourself. Is there anything
wrong with you?

MsgJp:
覚者サマってのは
意外と気取らないもんなんだな
MsgEn: Master Arisen is surprisingly unpretentious

MsgJp:
さすがにこの状況だ
アッカーシェランが無くなっちゃ
困るからな
MsgEn:
This is indeed the situation.
If we lose Acre Selund, we're in trouble.

MsgJp: 悪くいいたくはないが――
MsgEn: I don't mean to be rude, but...

MsgJp:
王子は結局のところ
甘やかされて育ったお坊ちゃま――
そんなところかね
MsgEn:
In the end, the prince was raised as a spoiled
brat-- I suppose that's how it goes.

MsgJp:
今まで多くの者たちがその行方を追っていたが
――サマラの指輪はおまえを選んだ
MsgEn:
Many have pursued its whereabouts, but the Ring
of Samara has chosen you.

MsgJp:
俺たちがおまえに協力することになったのも
何かの力が働いてのことかもしれんな
MsgEn:
The fact that we are cooperating with you may
also be the result of some higher power at work.

MsgJp: ああ、何かあったのか？
MsgEn: Ah, something happened?

MsgJp: 盗賊ってのはどこにでもいるからな
MsgEn: Thieves are everywhere.

MsgJp:
俺はさ――別に何でもよかったんだよな
生きるために畑耕すのも
盗みに入るのもおんなじだったんだ
MsgEn:
I was--I didn't really care about anything else.
I was just as likely to plow a field to survive as
I was to steal from it.

MsgJp:
アンタも覚者が嫌ンなって
行き場が無くなったら盗賊団に来なよ
MsgEn:
If you don't like being an Arisen and have
nowhere else to go, come join the bandits.

MsgJp: ふん――
MsgEn: Hmph――

MsgJp:
あまり気安く話しかけるな
俺たちは盗賊だ、あんたらとは違う
MsgEn:
Don't talk to me so casually. We are bandits,
different from you all.

MsgJp: どうしてこんなことになったんだかな
MsgEn: I wonder how things ended up like this.

MsgJp: ――楽しくお喋りしてやる気はない
MsgEn: I'm not in the mood to chat happily.

MsgJp:
うん？
あ、俺？　俺に話しかけてんのか？
MsgEn:
Huh?
Oh, me? Are you talking to me?

MsgJp:
話してやれることなんか
特に無いんだよな――
MsgEn: There is nothing in particular that I can do -

MsgJp:
やめろ、何かを期待して
何度も話しかけるのは
MsgEn:
Stop it. Repeatedly talking to me with
expectations...

MsgJp:
む――
頭領に、よそものと
あんまり馴れ合うなって言われてるからよ
MsgEn:
I'm not--
my chieftain told me not to get too friendly with
strangers.

MsgJp:
いやぁ――勘弁してくれ
俺、ユーモアってやつが無くてよ
あんたを笑かしてやれたらよかったんだがなぁ
MsgEn:
No... Please spare me.
I lack a sense of humor, you know.
I wish I could have made you laugh.

MsgJp:
あっ、いらっしゃい！
何か食べていってよ！
MsgEn: Oh, come on in! Please have something to eat!

MsgJp:
みんなのために食料――
なんとかしないと――
MsgEn:
For the sake of everyone, we need to do something
about the food situation ――

MsgJp: なんだかおなか空いてきちゃった
MsgEn: I'm kind of hungry.

MsgJp:
あ――
でも勢いだけの拾い食いは危険だからね～
MsgEn:
Ah-- But it's dangerous to just pick up and eat
with such alacrity~!

MsgJp:
瓦礫だらけでホコリっぽいし
できたら空気、入れ替えたいけど――
MsgEn:
There's rubble everywhere and it's dusty. I'd
like to change the air if I could, but--

MsgJp:
よく考えたらこの部屋――
窓ないよね？
MsgEn:
When I think about it, this room—doesn't have a
window, does it?

MsgJp:
ここで一人火を眺めてると
色々と思い出しちゃうな――
MsgEn:
Here, as I gaze at the fire alone, Various
memories come rushing back...

MsgJp:
なんかさ――
火ってすごいよね
MsgEn: You know... fire is amazing, isn't it?

MsgJp:
おいしいごはん作ってくれることもあれば――
大事なもの何もかも奪ってくことだってあるし
MsgEn:
They can cook you a delicious meal, or they can--
take away everything that's important to you.

MsgJp: ははは！
MsgEn: Hahaha!

MsgJp: ちょっと！
MsgEn: Hey!

MsgJp: えぇ！？
MsgEn: Eh!?

MsgJp: うーん
MsgEn: Hmm...

MsgJp: うーん
MsgEn: Hmm...

MsgJp: ダメ、もうホントに無理
MsgEn: No, it's really impossible now.

MsgJp: よし！
MsgEn: Alright!

MsgJp: ねぇ！
MsgEn: Hey!

MsgJp: ねぇ！
MsgEn: Hey!

MsgJp: ハァイ
MsgEn: Yes

MsgJp: そっか――
MsgEn: I see...

MsgJp: 何か無いかなぁ？
MsgEn: Is there anything?

MsgJp: こうなったら――！
MsgEn: If it becomes like this—!

MsgJp: これは食べられそうだね！
MsgEn: This looks edible!

MsgJp: ふぅー
MsgEn: Phew

MsgJp: 待ってよー！
MsgEn: Wait a minute!

MsgJp: 待ってよー！
MsgEn: Wait a minute!

MsgJp: こっち来ないでってば！
MsgEn: Don't come over here!

MsgJp: あっち行きなさいよ！
MsgEn: Go away!

MsgJp: アタシ、おいしくないって！
MsgEn: I'm not delicious!

MsgJp: 今日は何する？
MsgEn: What are you doing today?

MsgJp: 今日は何する？
MsgEn: What are you doing today?

MsgJp: どうしようか
MsgEn: What should I do?

MsgJp: どうしようか
MsgEn: What should I do?

MsgJp: お願い――
MsgEn: Please...

MsgJp:
今日できることは全部やれたみたい
また明日も来てくれると嬉しいな！
MsgEn:
I was able to do everything I could do today. I
would be happy if you could come again tomorrow!

MsgJp:
ローナやブラッド――
それに砦の兵隊さんまで
大食堂の修復手伝ってくれてるんだよ！
MsgEn:
Lorna and Brad, and even the soldiers in the
fort, are helping with the restoration work!

MsgJp: なんか“チーム”って感じだよね？
MsgEn: It feels like a 'team,' you know?

MsgJp: もちろん、あなたも！
MsgEn: And you, of course!

MsgJp:
あ！
なんか名前付けたいなー
MsgEn: Ah! I want to name it.

MsgJp:
ね！
何がいい？
MsgEn: Hey! What would you like?

MsgJp:
瓦礫はまだ残ってるけどさ
食料庫が復活しただけで
力が湧いてくるんだぁ
MsgEn:
The debris is still there, but the pantry is back
up and running. It gives me strength!

MsgJp:
ローナにね
最初にどこを直すか聞かれたから
でっかい声で――
MsgEn:
Lorna, huh.
When asked where to fix it first,
I shouted loudly――

MsgJp:
「食料庫！　食料庫がいい！！」
――って叫んじゃった
MsgEn: "Food storage! Food storage is good!" - I shouted.

MsgJp:
大食堂って壁に囲まれてるから
食料守るのには向いてるんだけど――
MsgEn:
The big dining hall is surrounded by walls, so it
is suitable for protecting food, but...

MsgJp:
お料理焦がしちゃったときとか
部屋中煙だらけになって
鼻の奥までコゲ臭くなるんだよね
MsgEn:
When the cooking gets burned,
and the room becomes filled with smoke,
it even smells burnt inside the nose.

MsgJp:
バレないように
壁にこっそり穴あけちゃおうかな？
MsgEn:
Shall we discreetly make a hole in the wall so
that we won't get caught?

MsgJp:
ペコ、ずっとここにいることにしたみたい
まぁ――初めて食堂に来た人は
ちょっとびっくりしてるけどね
MsgEn:
Peco seems to have decided to stay here forever.
Well, people who come to the cafeteria for the
first time might be a little surprised, though.

MsgJp:
あの子ってばゴブリンなのに
妙に気が弱かったりするからさ
アタシとしても、ここで元気にしてるの
見られる方が気が楽だよ
MsgEn:
She's a goblin, but she's strangely timid. As for
me, it's easier for me to see her here doing well.

MsgJp:
復旧してから色んな人が来てくれるんだ
おかげで忙しくって、賑やかで
毎日やることだらけだよ
MsgEn:
Since we've been back up and running, we've had
all kinds of people coming in. It's kept us busy
and buzzing. There's so much to do every day!

MsgJp:
ヘザーとアイダンも盛り上げてくれるし――
ペコも居ついちゃって、何だか自分なりに
仕事みたいなことしてるしね
MsgEn:
Heather and Aidan are also uplifting―― Peco has
settled in too, and in a way, is doing something
like work

MsgJp:
――さぁ、もっともっと頑張って
戦士のみんなに力付けてもらわないと！
ここからラスニテを――
ううん、アッカーシェランを元気にしていきたいんだ
MsgEn:
Alright, we need to push ourselves even harder,
We have to get support from all the soldiers! From
here on, let's restore Rath-- No, I want to bring
back the vitality of all of Acre Selund!

MsgJp:
大食堂、もうすっかり元通りだよ！　
――ううん、元の大食堂よりも良い感じかも
何ていったって皆で作り上げた食堂だからね！
MsgEn:
The cafeteria is back to normal now! No, it might
even be better than before. After all, we all
built this cafeteria together!

MsgJp:
あなたにもいっぱい協力してもらったよね
お陰で、ここまでやってこれたこと
とっても感謝してる！　本当にありがとう！
MsgEn:
You've helped me a lot.
Thanks to you, I've made it this far.
I'm very grateful!　Thank you so much!

MsgJp:
あなたは何が好き？
思い出の味とか、あるでしょ？
MsgEn:
What do you like?
Do you have a taste for memories?

MsgJp: ウ、ウガ？
MsgEn: U, uga?

MsgJp:
食ベモノ、集めタ！
キャリーうれしい？
MsgEn: Food and collectibles! Carrie, are you happy?

MsgJp: ココにいる、楽しイ！
MsgEn: It's fun being here!

MsgJp:
誰モ、イジメナイ――
ペコ――悪いコト、シナイ
MsgEn:
Whoever is in the armor, if they show up in front
of me, I'm just going to fight!

MsgJp:
次の作戦は――こっちでいくか
いやいや、逆にあっちの方が――
MsgEn:
The next strategy is...shall we go this way...
No, the other way around is better...

MsgJp:
ボクは、よく独り言を言ってるらしいんだけど
みんなが言うほどの実感がなくってね
MsgEn:
I often seem to be talking to myself, but I don't
really feel it as much as everyone says.

MsgJp:
普段から、まわりに誰かいるかとかは
特に気にしてはいないけど
ボクにとっては自然なことさ
MsgEn:
I usually don't pay much attention to whether
someone is around me or not. It's just natural for
me.

MsgJp: ――これは、独り言じゃないよね？
MsgEn: This isn't just talking to myself, right?

MsgJp:
展望城に自分の部屋はないのかって？
ああ、それなら以前
一度作ってもらったことがあってね
MsgEn:
Lookout Castle, isn't there a room for me there?
Ah, well, it's because I had one made before.

MsgJp:
でも、城内って広くて複雑でさ
部屋に戻るたびに迷うのに飽きてしまって
気が付いたら場所を忘れてたんだよ
MsgEn:
But the castle is so big and complicated. I got
tired of getting lost every time I went back to my
room and realized I'd forgotten where I was.

MsgJp:
今覚えてる場所は――
城の入り口と、王宮層と
あとはシチューのある食堂だけさ！
MsgEn:
The only places I remember now are—the castle
entrance, the royal layer, and the cafeteria with
the stew!

MsgJp: ボクは、作戦というものは“生き物”だと思ってる
MsgEn: I think that a strategy is like a living creature.

MsgJp:
いくら事前に完璧に計画したつもりでも
その場の状況でいくらだって変わるし
思い通りに行く方が珍しいくらいさ
MsgEn:
No matter how perfectly you plan it in advance,
it can change at any moment, and it's rare that
things go the way you want them to.

MsgJp:
まぁ、そこが面白いところなんだけどね
何でも思った通りになるなんて
つまんないだろ？
MsgEn:
Well, that's the interesting part about it, you
know? It's boring for everything to just go as you
think.

MsgJp: 準備はいいかい？それじゃ行こう
MsgEn: Are you ready? Let's go.

MsgJp: 準備はいいかい？　それじゃ行こう
MsgEn: Are you ready? Let's go.

MsgJp: きっと、何かあるはずさ
MsgEn: There's got to be something.

MsgJp: きっと、何かあるはずさ
MsgEn: There's got to be something.

MsgJp: ふんふん、なるほどね
MsgEn: Hmmm... I see.

MsgJp: いや、待てよ？
MsgEn: No, wait, could you?

MsgJp: いや、待てよ？
MsgEn: No, wait, could you?

MsgJp:
そうか！　そういうことか！
やはり僕は、天才だね！
MsgEn:
Ah, I see! So that's how it is! As I thought, I
am a genius!

MsgJp:
おかしいなぁ――
今日はちょっと調子が悪いらしい！
MsgEn:
Hmm, that's strange... It seems like I'm feeling
a little unwell today!

MsgJp:
おかしいなぁ――
今日はちょっと調子が悪いらしい！
MsgEn:
Hmm, that's strange...
It seems like I'm feeling a little unwell today!

MsgJp: ほら、僕の思った通りだろう？
MsgEn: See, it's just as I thought, isn't it?

MsgJp:
はっはっは！
たまにはこんなこともあるさ！
MsgEn: Hahaha! Sometimes things like this happen!

MsgJp:
はっはっは！
たまにはこんなこともあるさ！
MsgEn:
Hahaha!
Sometimes things like this happen!

MsgJp: あー、キミキミ
MsgEn: Oh, you, you.

MsgJp: あー、キミキミ
MsgEn: Oh, you, you

MsgJp: ちょっといいかな？　隊長
MsgEn: Can I have a word with you?　Captain.

MsgJp: ちょっといいかな？　隊長
MsgEn: Can I have a word with you?　Captain.

MsgJp: おかしいなぁ――
MsgEn: Hmm, something is strange.

MsgJp: やはり僕は、天才だね！
MsgEn: I am a genius, after all!

MsgJp: それじゃあ行こう！
MsgEn: Let's go then!

MsgJp: ここにはもう何もなさそうだ
MsgEn: There doesn't seem to be anything here anymore.

MsgJp: さて、帰るとしよう！
MsgEn: Now, let's go home!

MsgJp: ああ、もう――だめだ――
MsgEn: Oh, no—it's no use—

MsgJp: アハハハ！
MsgEn: Ahahaha!

MsgJp: アハハハ！
MsgEn: Ahahaha!

MsgJp: んんっ！？
MsgEn: Huh?!

MsgJp: んんっ！？
MsgEn: Huh?!

MsgJp: えぇっと――
MsgEn: Um...

MsgJp: はぁ～
MsgEn: Ha~

MsgJp: はぁ～
MsgEn: Ha~

MsgJp: あれ――
MsgEn: That—

MsgJp:
ここにはもう何もなさそうだ
僕の勘がそう囁いているのでね
さて、帰るとしよう！
MsgEn:
There doesn't seem to be anything else here.
That's what my instincts are whispering to me, you
know. Well, let's go home!

MsgJp:
やったね！
僕らがいれば敵無しなんじゃないか！？
MsgEn:
Great job! If we're together, we have no enemies,
don't we?!

MsgJp:
あー、ごめん
今ちょっと考えなきゃいけないことが
あってね、忙しいんだ
MsgEn:
Oh, sorry. There's something I need to think
about right now. I'm busy.

MsgJp:
ありがとう！　助かったよ！
よしよしこれで――
MsgEn: Thank you! I'm saved! Good job—

MsgJp:
もう終わったの？
さすが、頼りになるね！
MsgEn:
Is it already over? As expected, you're
dependable!

MsgJp: さて、何をする？
MsgEn: Now, what to do?

MsgJp: さて、何をする？
MsgEn: Now, what to do?

MsgJp: やあ
MsgEn: Hey

MsgJp: やあ
MsgEn: Hey

MsgJp: よく来たね
MsgEn: Nice to see you

MsgJp: よく来たね
MsgEn: Nice to see you

MsgJp: はあはあ、久しぶりの戦は体に応えるなぁ
MsgEn:
Ha ha! It's been a while since the last battle,
it's taking a toll on my body

MsgJp: ちょっと待った、少し休憩させてくれ
MsgEn: Wait a moment, please let me take a short break.

MsgJp: あれ、体が重いぞ、こんなはずじゃあ
MsgEn:
Oh, my body feels heavy. This is not how it
should be.

MsgJp: や、やっぱり僕は室内で策を練ってる方が――
MsgEn: I think I'd rather be indoors, planning...

MsgJp: 少しは、動けるようになってきたぞ――
MsgEn: I've become a little more mobile.

MsgJp: ああ、でもまだ苦しい、ちょっと休憩
MsgEn: Ah, but I'm still hurting, I need a little break.

MsgJp: キミから見て、今の僕ってどうかな？
MsgEn: How do I look now from your point of view?

MsgJp: もうちょっと頑張れそうな気も――ううん
MsgEn: I think I can do a little more -- no.

MsgJp: あははは、どうだい僕の動き、軽やかだろう？
MsgEn: Ha-ha-ha, how's my movement, light, isn't it?

MsgJp: 風のように走り、雷のように刺す！
MsgEn: Running like the wind, piercing like thunder!

MsgJp: なに、前はちょっと腕が鈍ってただけさ！
MsgEn: No, I was just a little rusty before!

MsgJp: ふふ、戦える参謀官っていいよね
MsgEn:
Hehe, having a capable staff officer who can
fight is nice, isn't it?

MsgJp: え、見つかった！？
MsgEn: Wait, it was found!?

MsgJp: さすが隊長だ！
MsgEn: As expected, Captain!

MsgJp:
ハッ――
驚いた、何か用？
MsgEn:
Ha-- You scared the hell out of me. What can I do
for you?

MsgJp: 悪いけど、楽しく世間話する気分じゃないんだ
MsgEn:
Sorry, I'm just not in the mood for pleasant
small talk.

MsgJp:
こんな状況だから――
子供だからって何もわからないわけじゃないよ
MsgEn:
Because of this situation ―― Just because I'm a
child doesn't mean I don't understand anything.

MsgJp:
もっと悪いことになったら
生きていくのが難しくなるかもしれない
そんな時に、走り回って遊べる？
MsgEn:
If things get worse... It might be difficult to
survive. Can you run around and play at such
times?

MsgJp: ああ、どうも
MsgEn: Oh, thank you.

MsgJp:
家の中に閉じこもったり
洞窟に隠れたりできればいいんですが
そういうわけにもいかないでしょう
MsgEn:
I wish I could lock myself in my house or hide in
a cave, but that's not going to happen.

MsgJp:
ちょっとした用がありましてね
ある程度、覚悟して家を出てきたんです
――いや、甘かったです
MsgEn:
I had some business to attend to, and I left home
with some degree of determination, but I
underestimated it.

MsgJp:
今も商人が来てくれる村もありますが
そうじゃない小さな村もたくさんありますから
危険を承知で外に出ざるを得ないんです
MsgEn:
There are some villages that still have merchants
coming to them, but there are many small villages
that don't, so we have to go out there and take
the risk.

MsgJp:
え、なんだって？
すまないね、最近耳が遠くて――
MsgEn:
What? What did you say?
I'm sorry, I've been a little hard of hearing
lately.

MsgJp:
竜が倒された――
言ってしまえば、ただ一つの事件が
起こっただけで、この有様だ
MsgEn:
The dragon has been defeated—To put it simply,
only one event has occurred, resulting in this
state.

MsgJp:
竜と――それに連なる王家を
もっと守っておけば
こうはならなかったのかね――
MsgEn:
If only we had protected the dragons and the
royal family that follows them more, would it not
have come to this?

MsgJp:
王家に仕えてた人たちは
一体何をしてるんだか
まったく情けない話だよ
MsgEn:
I don't know what the hell the people who served
the royal family are doing. It's utterly pathetic.

MsgJp: ふぅん、君が覚者ですか
MsgEn: Oh, are you an Arisen?

MsgJp:
――何でもチャンスとして見ないと
我が家の家訓でしてね
MsgEn:
-- I have to look at everything as an
opportunity. It's a family tradition.

MsgJp:
自分の暮らしは自分で守らないと、ですよ
そういった努力ができない者は
まぁ、痛い目を見ても――仕方ないのでは？
MsgEn:
If you don't protect your own life, well, it
can't be helped if you suffer the consequences.

MsgJp:
我々の一族は、万が一の時のために
人脈を広げ、貯蓄してきましたから
そういったことをしていない人は
まぁ、今大変なんじゃないですか
MsgEn:
Our family has been networking and saving in case
of an emergency, so if you haven't done those
things, well, you're in a tough spot right now.

MsgJp:
こんにちは
あのぅ、えっと――
MsgEn: Hello, umm, well...

MsgJp: わたし、これからどうすればいいんでしょう
MsgEn: What am I going to do now?

MsgJp:
母に逃げてって言われたんです
それでここまで来たんです――
MsgEn: My mother told me to run away, so I came here...

MsgJp: ちょっと疲れちゃった――
MsgEn: I'm a little tired...

MsgJp:
ん？　何？
言いたいことがあるなら言いなよ
MsgEn:
Huh? What is it?
If you have something to say, go ahead

MsgJp:
今までも辛いことはたくさんあったんだ
今回だって、絶対に乗り越えられる――
MsgEn:
I've been through a lot of hard times in the
past. I'll get through this one, too--I promise.

MsgJp:
眠る場所と、食べる物――
あとは、守りたいもの
それだけあればしばらく大丈夫、私はね
MsgEn:
A place to sleep, something to eat-- and
something to protect That's all you need for a
while, for me.

MsgJp:
この通り、剣持って戦えはしないけど
逃げ足はまぁまぁ速い方だと思ってるからさ
MsgEn:
As you can see, I can't fight with a sword, but I
think I'm a reasonably fast runner.

MsgJp: ああ、どうも――
MsgEn: Ah, thank you.

MsgJp:
あの、旅をしていらっしゃるなら――
若い夫婦を見ませんでしたか？
MsgEn:
Um, if you are traveling--
have you seen a young couple?

MsgJp:
息子夫婦と一緒に暮らしてたんですが
オークの襲撃から逃れる時に
はぐれてしまったんです
MsgEn:
I was living with my son and his wife when we got
separated while fleeing an orc raid.

MsgJp:
命は助かっても、独りで暮らすのは
堪えるものです――
MsgEn:
Even if your life is spared, living alone can be
unbearable--

MsgJp: あら、どうかして？
MsgEn: Oh, what's wrong?

MsgJp:
みんなで力を合わせて立ち上がれば――
でも、上手くいかないものね
なかなか協力してくれる方がいなくて
MsgEn:
